subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After her loss on Friday to Barbora Zahlavova Strycova, Li Na has now twice been one of the fastest top players to the exits in the last two Grand Slam events.
snippet: After her loss on Friday to Barbora Zahlavova Strycova, Li Na has now twice been one of the fastest top players to the exits in the last two Grand Slam events.
